channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report E-2024090092
item.description:
Report E-2024090092

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-08T09:12:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-21
  • City: DES MOINES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SAFETY-KLEEN SYSTEMS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: When unloading from the truck the forklift operator caught the edge of the lift gate and cut the plastic allowing the material to be released onto the warehouse floor. They were able to get absorbent put down immediately to contain the release. They had a team transfer the material into a new tote to be shipped out. The material that was released was then cleaned up and disposed of in the appropriate manner.

item.title: Report X-2024090123
item.description:
Report X-2024090123

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-05T09:13:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-16
  • City: RED OAK
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PRELOADER DISCOVERED LEAKING PACKAGE IN TRAILER RMP IDENTIFIED CONTENT AS HAZARDOUS, DOT DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL ON INNER PACKAGING, BROUGHT PACKAGE TO DMP AND CALLED THE HAZARDOUS SUPPORT LINE. WE WERE ADVISED TO PROCESS AS UNDECLARED HAZMAT. INNER PACKAGING CONTAINED DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL UN2735 UN3082. WE SOLIDIFY CONTENTS AND PUT INTO GREEN BAG AND BUCKETS AMINES, LIQUID, CORROSIVE, N.O.S. (PART B) / ENVIRONMENTALLY HAZARDOUS SUBSTANCE, LIQUID, N.O.S. (PART A) - NOT REGULATED NON BULK. DAMAGE INSPECTION; PART B LEAKED

item.title: Report E-2024080767
item.description:
Report E-2024080767

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-05T00:46:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-27
  • City: ALTOONA
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed the released material impacted the trailer floor released from one (1) 1-gallon metal container. Dayton Freight personnel cleaned the impacted area and containerized the cleanup debris. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freightâ€™s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.
